dc:title: Christmas
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Three reflections: a child's view of Christmas, trusting in God to guide one's work, and picketing as passive resistance to injustice.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 199 1934-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
